data: `minecraft:behavior.sleep` allows an entity to sleep in a bed.
This behavior can only be used by the `villager` entity type.

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

data.Name: sleep_collider_height
data.Description: The height of the mob's collider while sleeping

data.Name: sleep_collider_width
data.Description: The width of the mob's collider while sleeping

data.Name: sleep_y_offset
data.Description: The y offset of the mob's collider while sleeping

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

data.Name: timeout_cooldown
data.Description: The cooldown time in seconds before the goal can be reused after a internal failure or timeout condition
